name: Web Design Guidelines
description: Review UI code for Web Interface Guidelines compliance. Use when asked to "review my UI", "check accessibility", "audit design", "review UX", or "check my site against best practices".
longDescription: Vercel's web interface design guidelines condensed into a single SKILL.md reference. Reviews UI code for accessibility compliance, UX patterns, responsive design, interaction design, and visual consistency. Catches common issues in HTML, CSS, and component markup -- missing ARIA attributes, poor contrast ratios, non-semantic markup, broken keyboard navigation -- before they reach production. No additional scripts or dependencies.
